Sentencas: The grain boundary plays an important role in the electrical behaviors of solid oxide electrolytes for solid state fuel cells.
Titulo: Relationship between lattice mismatch and ionic conduction of grain boundary in YSZ

Sentencas: To reveal the relationship between the structure and the ionic conductivity of grain boundary, the conductive properties of {1 1 1} and {1 1 0} twist grain boundaries in 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia have been examined.
Titulo: Relationship between lattice mismatch and ionic conduction of grain boundary in YSZ

Sentencas: These boundaries have a series of Sigma values defined by the coincident site lattice model.
Titulo: Relationship between lattice mismatch and ionic conduction of grain boundary in YSZ

Sentencas: It has been found that the activation energy of {1 1 1} twist grain boundary increases and then decreases with the Sigma value, while that of the {1 1 0} boundary shows an opposite trend.
Titulo: Relationship between lattice mismatch and ionic conduction of grain boundary in YSZ

Sentencas: It is suggested that the properties can reflect the balance of the effects of lattice mismatch on the diffusion ability of oxygen vacancies and the segregation of oxygen vacancies and Y3+ ions.
Titulo: Relationship between lattice mismatch and ionic conduction of grain boundary in YSZ

Sentencas: Therefore, the properties in polycrystalline electrolyte can be adjusted by controlling the grain boundary structures.
Titulo: Relationship between lattice mismatch and ionic conduction of grain boundary in YSZ
